entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WARNING , Rivière-du-Loup
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 7:58 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Rivière-du-Loup 10:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Temperature: 2.1°C
Pressure: 97.8 kPa
Humidity: 93 %
Dewpoint: 1.2°C
Wind: ESE 25 km/h gust 37 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries or rain showers. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Rain changing to flurries near midnight. Risk of snow squalls overnight. Snow inland this evening. Snowfall amount 5 cm except 10 cm inland. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 80 becoming southwest 50 gusting to 80 after midnight. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 8:14 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 near the river. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 8:14 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 8:14 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
